title: Subchapter L - Hospitals and Related Facilities
content:
Subchapter L - Hospitals and Related Facilities

State Regulations

Part 81 - Residential Health Care Facilities; Patient Abuse (ยง 81.1 to 81.92)

Part 82 - Health Systems Agencies (Subpart 82-1 to 82-2)

Part 83 - Shared Health Facilities (Subpart 83-1 to 83-2)

Part 84 - Attendance Rules For Hospital Teachers

Part 85 - Medical Assistance Benefits

Part 86 - Reporting and Rate Certifications for Facilities (Subpart 86-1 to 86-13)

Part 87 - Nursing Home Company And Hospital Mortgage Loans

Part 88 - Helen Hayes Hospital, New York State Veterans' Home And Roswell Park Memorial Institute (Subpart 88-1 to 88-5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
